and wow rs2 has much unneeded code …

This is what’s written in my unjail command:

        }else if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 2) {

           c.teleportToY = 3491; 
        c.teleblock = false; 
           c.sendMessage("YOUR MESSAGE HERE"); 
        updateRequired = true; 
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

                            "You have been released from jail by " + playerName);
